attributes.action: Stop Masterfoods (MARS) using animal products in their confectionary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Masterfoods have started using animals products in their Mars confectionary, we would like them to stop using animal prodcuts and return to their previous option which was a vegiterian ingredient.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
